attributes.action: Allow local authorities to issue the 25% council tax reduction to the families of soldiers whilst they are away on operations abroad for 6 months or more. The same benefits afforded to the partners of students, carers, foreign language assistants, prisoners & those on remand.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The partners of soldiers serving abroad on operations are liable to pay full council tax on private accomodation during the time they are away, although the serving soldier has no benefit from council services whilst abroad & the property is occupied by one adult. Although there is a single adult living at the property for months at a time they are not afforded the same benefits as single people, those with partners on a low income or those whose partners are in jail.
